org.gearvrf

Class GVRMain

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gearvrf.GVRScript
      • org.gearvrf.GVRMain
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEventReceiver, IEvents, IScriptEvents, IScriptable

    public abstract class GVRMain
extends GVRScript
    Extend this class to create a GVRF application. The methods are called on the main framework thread. This is *not* the GL thread.
